name: Swords And Sandals 2
summary: Several years later, the dark Emperor Antares turned the gladiatorial games into a vast and bloody spectacle. Another man, a slave, rose to become the greatest champion ever known. He bested Antares' twenty Arena Champions before defeating the Emperor himself in battle, freeing the slaves and becoming legend.
info:
• 中文名: 刀剑竞技场2
  • 别名: 古罗马比武场2
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游戏引擎: FLASH
  • 官方网站: http://www.swordsandsandals.com/
